ResearchProjectDef.label: Nuclear power
ResearchProjectDef.description: A probe has been detected in orbit! It seems to be sending signals to the surface; maybe we can decipher its message.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
You open a connection to the probe and a recorded message starts to play.

Someone with the slimy demeanour of a used bionics salesman claims to represent a trading faction known as "Rimatomics".

As he makes his sales pitch, gigabits of data begins flooding into the console. He explains that he's sending blueprints to construct a Rimatomics research bench, which you can use to purchase plans for some of their technology or request trade ships.
